mapper.insert: insert into route values(route_seq.nextval,#{mem_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{route_subject, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{route_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{route_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{route_itinerary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{route_tour, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{route_region, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{route_hashtag, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate)
